overview:
Jose Guardado is currently the Director of Recruiting for Nebula, Inc.

Prior to joining Nebula, he served as Senior Technical Recruiter for Google’s Platforms/Datacenter groups, supporting nationwide hiring for Google’s custom warehouse-scale computing infrastructure.

Previously, Jose was a top-performing recruiter for Cisco Systems business strategy and operations group, and worked as a Key Account Executive for Yahoo! HotJobs.

Jose began his recruiting career at boutique search consultancy GravityPeople in San Francisco.
